sentence.Network_en: My sister was put in charge of the apiary.
sentence.Network_cn: 我姐姐被派去负责养蜂场.

sentence.Network_en: These requirements rule for all apiary sites, including migration sites.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些规定是蜂房所在地必须满足的条件, 迁移地也是一样.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin apiarium, from apis 'bee'

means.word_mean: 1. a shed containing a number of beehives

auth_sentence.content: Bee-keeper John Edwards-Windsor said five hives were recently stolen from his apiary in Otford.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bee-keeper John Edwards-Windsor said five hives were recently stolen from his apiary in Otford.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bee-keeper John Edwards-Windsor said five hives were recently stolen from his apiary in Otford.

auth_sentence.content: The two-night stay features a visit to an apiary to find out how to extract honey and wax without getting stung.
auth_sentence.res_content: The two-night stay features a visit to an apiary to find out how to extract honey and wax without getting stung.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The two-night stay features a visit to an apiary to find out how to extract honey and wax without getting stung.

auth_sentence.content: Otherwise" he turned back to the colonel from Houston "your apiary training will come and go like the wind.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"人,场所,物等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine想象,设想+ary……的→adj.想象的,虚构的
auxili+ary……的→adj.辅助的,补助的
document文档+ary……的;表"物"→文件的[形容词];记录片[名词]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 初步的;基本的;[化]元素的;自然力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: element元素+ary……的→adj.初步的;基本的;[化]元素的;自然力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 荣誉的,名誉的;无报酬的,义务的
stems_affixes.word_buile: honor荣誉,尊敬+ary……的→adj.荣誉的,名誉的;无报酬的,义务的
mercen=merc交易+ary……的→像做贸易一样→唯利是图的
moment片刻;瞬间+ary……的→adj.瞬间的,刹那间的
sed=sid坐+ent+ary……的→坐着的
station位置,岗位+ary……的→adj.静止的,固定的
tempor时间或时间引起的现象+ary……的→有时间性的→临时的
mission使命+ary人,场所,物等→[传教]使命的
document文档+ary……的;表"物"→文件的[形容词];记录片[名词]
mercen=merc交易+ary……的→像做贸易一样→唯利是图的
adverse逆的+ary人,场所,物等→n.对手,敌手
api蜜蜂+ary人,场所,物等→n.养蜂场
distribute分发+ary人,场所,物等→n.分流,支流
e出+miss派+ary人→派去的人
lumin光+ary东西或人→发光的东西或人→名人
mission使命+ary人,场所,物等→[传教]使命的
mort死+u+ary人,场所,物等→n.停尸房,太平间
penitent后悔+iary=ary人,场所,物等→n.监狱,感化院
sanct神圣+u+ary表示场所→n.圣堂,避难所
secret秘密[的]+ary人,场所,物等→n.秘书,书记;部长,大臣
voluptu拉丁文,意为pleasure+ary人,场所,物等→n.耽于逸乐的人
